title: Create your farm
shortDesc: Only fill one form and create your farm presenting your coffee detailed. This is going to be your profile to be shown all over the world.

title: Set the price of your coffee
shortDesc: We know you coffee cost more than the market that is why you can set the price of your coffee based in your real production cost.

title: Join in a professional community
shortDesc: Join the largest community of coffee farmers around the world. Share experiences, knowledge and comming soon more farmers from other goods will join too
